title: alexey29185185
author: alexey29185185
content: Hello for all!Yes, the title does not lie, now the new game monsterra.io is very hyping in the nft community. Today we will try to figure out with«It is realistic to make 5+ dollars a day on it and how much time will it take? »Article structure:What is a monsterra?How much you need to «download» to start earning income?How to increase income and minimize time spent?1.What is a Monsterra…I understand you, starting to read the article, you immediately went to Google and decided to find out what and how, now you have a logical question, « how can a potted flower make money?»https://monsterra.io/ - a simple browser game with an economic component.The site presents the distribution of assets and the total capitalization, all this can be drawn, but this adds credibility to the project, which is undoubtedly a plus.The developer himself calls his game the best NFT game in the metaverse.There are even developers on the site, although they are anonymous.But it adds confidence, you see.Now about the game itself In total, the game has 4 modes, each of them is interesting in its own way.In essence, there is a little bit of everything, some from Pokemon, some from other similar games.This is the basic information on the project, let's move on to the game itself. 2. How to earn…1. Go to the site https://metamask.io/download/ and install the extension 2. We register in the extension or enter if it already exists. For those who don’t have it, save yourself a seed phrase, you will need it for verification. As a result, we have such a picture3. We go to the game website4. Click play game5. We register at your convenience, the choice is large6. Waiting for download 7. We go through metamask8. We go through training and start downloading an accountThis part is the longest, unfortunately, many people mistakenly believe that if they have pumped 4-5 levels in a couple of days, then it will be easy for them to reach 11.This is not true.If you spend 3-4 hours a day on the game, then level 11 can be downloaded from one to 4 weeks. Which is really long.The process itself can be greatly accelerated if you buy 4 uncommon characters, they are cheap, it takes 4-5 days to redeem.In essence, playing with donations is much easier and faster. Unfortunately, the mathematics of the project is now something like this - 5 hours of play - 1 dollar.But then we will take a closer look at how to make $ 5 or even more in 5 hours, it all depends on your desire and the power of your car.In the game itself, for completing tasks, we will receive the $MAG token, we change it to $MSTR and sell it, by the way, on July 16, this token was listed on the MEXC exchange.3. How to make insted 1 dollar a day 5?Our math will be very simple, we take 5 accounts, open 5 browser windows and download accounts.We farm tokens, convert, earn.In words, everything is so, and the developer does not seem to ban, but the game is developing very actively. Updates are constantly coming out and most likely very soon, depending on when you read the article, this shop will be closed. Therefore, we will immediately talk about how we can avoid all this.First, let's take a look at what we need.1. Antidetect browser. In my case it will be GoLogin.  https://gologin.com/ We will not analyze how it is better or worse than others, we will consider why it is specifically needed.An antidetect browser is required in our scheme. It will replace our data, our browser fingerprint, in short, it is a unique digital footprint that you leave wherever possible. Thus, having logged in through this browser, any site will think that you logged in from a new device, from another PC or laptop, and will not suspect you of trying to multi-account or cheat.Such browsers are actively used by absolutely everything, from traffic arbitrators to gamers who want to use multiple accounts in online games.You should definitely try GoLogin, especially since the service provides one week of use of the anti-detect browser for free. Get 14 days trial instead of 7 by promo code ANTIKGOLOGIN14. Enter the promo code after downloading the browser.*2. Ip proxy - you need to have good Internet speed and so that the developer does not ban you for one account.Proxy - Changes your IP to the one you buy. That is, using an anti-detect browser, you can sit, as it were, in Frankfurt, London and New York, but in fact you are at home, in your apartment in Moscow.This is a very important point, proxies completely close the issue of calculating you by IP, and the anti-detect browser closes the technical part. That is, you will not be undermined from which side you look. This method also works successfully in other games that I wrote about earlier, and this method is also used by the same arbitrageurs in order not to receive blocking from facebook and they succeed. So, let's move on to the scheme:1. Download the antidetect browser and register2. Click New Profile4. We call it whatever you like5. Buying a proxy6. Paste the purchased proxy into the antidetect browser7. On the right we see that our hardware has been changed8. Create a profile9. Click Run and get into the browser11. Download metamask, register, go into the game and also register12. We get 1 account, repeat steps 1-10 and get 5 accounts. We open them in 5 windows at the same time and perform Dailies, looting experience and tokens.The mechanics of the game is based on waiting, so keeping 5 accounts active at the same time will not be more difficult. Accordingly, you can have 5 dollars practically on a liability.ConclusionMonsterra is a new and promising project that has recently left the testnet.With such games, everything is simple - the earlier you enter, the higher the chance to earn.Over time, any project comes to naught or when the game is very hyped - it merges in income, the coin is rolled away and there are fewer opportunities to earn income. The Internet remembers hundreds, if not thousands, of such examples.Do not delay! The game does not require investments and you can try it right now.Thanks for reading and good luck!
